position: Reinventing India’s Future, One School at a Time | Storyteller of Change at The Circle | Shaping Education, Inspiring Impact I Fundraising and OperationsI

experience.title: Fundraising, Operations and Launch
experience.description: -Manage communications with 25+ donors, building and maintaining long-term relationships to support organizational goals.-Collaborate with external stakeholders to rework donor engagement strategies, driving improved results for the fundraising pipeline.-Conduct in-depth donor research, identifying new leads and opportunities for growth.-Lead the integration of Salesforce for organizational operations, developing a tailored pipeline and ensuring smooth data migration (24-25 datasets).-Work closely with teams to design and implement CRM solutions, optimizing donor engagement and tracking.-Actively network with external partners, fostering collaboration to support programmatic initiatives.-Engage with multiple external stakeholders, building relationships with 4-5 school leaders and key education influencers across the country.-Manage office hardware procurement and operational needs, ensuring efficiency in daily activities.-Work with 10-15 EIRs in launching their schools, providing support in funding and regulations.-Build SOPs for School and College Launch to enable EIRs to successfully launch their schools.
experience.description_html: -Manage communications with 25+ donors, building and maintaining long-term relationships to support organizational goals.-Collaborate with external stakeholders to rework donor engagement strategies, driving improved results for the fundraising pipeline.-Conduct in-depth donor research, identifying new leads and opportunities for growth.-Lead the integration of Salesforce for organizational operations, developing a tailored pipeline and ensuring smooth data migration (24-25 datasets).-Work closely with teams to design and implement CRM solutions, optimizing donor engagement and tracking.-Actively network with external partners, fostering collaboration to support programmatic initiatives.-Engage with multiple external stakeholders, building relationships with 4-5 school leaders and key education influencers across the country.-Manage office hardware procurement and operational needs, ensuring efficiency in daily activities.-Work with 10-15 EIRs in launching their schools, providing support in funding and regulations.-Build SOPs for School and College Launch to enable EIRs to successfully launch their schools.

positions.subtitle: U&I Trust
positions.description: - Oversaw the coordination of 500+ stakeholders involved in the Teach program across 8 cities, ensuring alignment with program goals and operational efficiency.- Tracked and evaluated the impact of volunteer projects statewide, providing data-driven insights for continuous improvement.- Conducted surveys, interviews and focus group discussions to collect feedback, performing thematic analysis on positivity in training sessions to enhance future events.- Developed case studies from the data across the state.- Managed the recruitment and onboarding processes for volunteers, interns, and associates, optimizing talent acquisition for the program.- Facilitated the organization's shift towards collaborating with schools, researching and presenting the 'Mission Vatsalya' policy to secure sustainable partnerships.- Established the U&I Teach program in Mauritius, expanding the organization’s international footprint.- Developed detailed project plans and timelines, successfully managing a team of two associates to implement statewide programs.- Managed a crowdfunding campaign for the city, achieving a fundraising goal of over 5 Lakhs.- Analyzed technology usage and behavior among volunteers and employees to improve the After School Volunteer Intervention’s program design.- Evaluated and interviewed fellowship candidates, advising the leadership team on the best-fit individuals based on skills and potential.- Facilitated workshops for 100+ educators, enhancing their professional development through targeted training.- Conducted quarterly site evaluations, offering tailored recommendations to optimize program delivery and operations.
positions.title: Program Manager
positions.description_html:
- Oversaw the coordination of 500+ stakeholders involved in the Teach program across 8 cities, ensuring alignment with program goals and operational efficiency.
- Tracked and evaluated the impact of volunteer projects statewide, providing data-driven insights for continuous improvement.
- Conducted surveys, interviews and focus group discussions to collect feedback, performing thematic analysis on positivity in training sessions to enhance future events.
- Developed case studies from the data across the state.
- Managed the recruitment and onboarding processes for volunteers, interns, and associates, optimizing talent acquisition for the program.
- Facilitated the organization's shift towards collaborating with schools, researching and presenting the 'Mission Vatsalya' policy to secure sustainable partnerships.
- Established the U&I Teach program in Mauritius, expanding the organization’s international footprint.
- Developed detailed project plans and timelines, successfully managing a team of two associates to implement statewide programs.
- Managed a crowdfunding campaign for the city, achieving a fundraising goal of over 5 Lakhs.
- Analyzed technology usage and behavior among volunteers and employees to improve the After School Volunteer Intervention’s program design.
- Evaluated and interviewed fellowship candidates, advising the leadership team on the best-fit individuals based on skills and potential.
- Facilitated workshops for 100+ educators, enhancing their professional development through targeted training.
- Conducted quarterly site evaluations, offering tailored recommendations to optimize program delivery and operations.

positions.subtitle: U&I Trust
positions.description: - Led operations for the Teach program, overseeing 500+ stakeholders across 8 cities to ensure smooth execution and impactful outcomes.- Directed the monitoring and assessment of volunteer-led projects for the state, analyzing statewide impact.- Performed in-depth analysis on training event outcomes, focusing on the positivity of participant feedback using data from surveys and interviews.- Spearheaded a successful crowdfunding campaign in the city, raising more than 5 Lakhs in contributions.- Spearheaded recruitment and training strategies for volunteers, interns, and associates to strengthen organizational capacity.- Strategized partnerships with educational institutions, building relationships with 20+ colleges across Tier 2 & Tier 3 cities via LinkedIn outreach.- Launched new program chapters in Varanasi and Hubli, fostering growth in underrepresented regions.- Organized training workshops for 100+ educators, empowering them with new methodologies and tools.- Led a leadership hackathon to innovate and cultivate leadership skills within the state.- Regularly conducted on-site reviews, providing actionable insights and recommending best practices for teams on the ground.- Built the program infrastructure from scratch in three cities, scaling operations effectively.- Led the expansion strategy to reach 45 cities, coordinating cross-team efforts and driving key performance metrics.- Designed and executed a social media campaign to drive awareness and engagement for city expansion efforts.- Managed logistics and travel arrangements for the national leadership event, ensuring a seamless experience for all attendees.
positions.title: Associate Program Manager
positions.description_html:
- Led operations for the Teach program, overseeing 500+ stakeholders across 8 cities to ensure smooth execution and impactful outcomes.
- Directed the monitoring and assessment of volunteer-led projects for the state, analyzing statewide impact.
- Performed in-depth analysis on training event outcomes, focusing on the positivity of participant feedback using data from surveys and interviews.
- Spearheaded a successful crowdfunding campaign in the city, raising more than 5 Lakhs in contributions.
- Spearheaded recruitment and training strategies for volunteers, interns, and associates to strengthen organizational capacity.
- Strategized partnerships with educational institutions, building relationships with 20+ colleges across Tier 2 & Tier 3 cities via LinkedIn outreach.
- Launched new program chapters in Varanasi and Hubli, fostering growth in underrepresented regions.
- Organized training workshops for 100+ educators, empowering them with new methodologies and tools.
- Led a leadership hackathon to innovate and cultivate leadership skills within the state.
- Regularly conducted on-site reviews, providing actionable insights and recommending best practices for teams on the ground.
- Built the program infrastructure from scratch in three cities, scaling operations effectively.
- Led the expansion strategy to reach 45 cities, coordinating cross-team efforts and driving key performance metrics.
- Designed and executed a social media campaign to drive awareness and engagement for city expansion efforts.
- Managed logistics and travel arrangements for the national leadership event, ensuring a seamless experience for all attendees.

experience.title: Creative Director
experience.description: 1. Worked as Creative Director on two theatre projects, overseeing creative vision, script development, and stage design.2. Planned and hosted the Annual Shades International Short Film Festival, managing event logistics and curating film submissions.3. Collaborated with the team on marketing and communication strategies for theatre projects and the film festival, driving audience engagement and visibility.

experience.title: Curiculum & Recruitment Intern
experience.description: - Developed Holistic Lesson Plans for U&I’s online teaching program, enabling volunteer teachers to conduct effective virtual classes.- Supported Recruitment Operations, taking on additional responsibilities and mentoring new interns.- Demonstrated strong communication and adaptability, meeting all objectives and contributing to smooth operations.

experience.title: Creative Artist
experience.description: 1. Collaborated with Lokadharmi Theatre to develop a theatre program for Me Help India, aimed at promoting mental health across 8 rural and urban cities in Kerala.2. Designed and developed short plays that addressed mental health themes, fostering awareness and dialogue within communities.Performed these short plays directly with audiences, creating an interactive and engaging experience.3. Contributed to the creative process, blending artistic expression with social impact to address mental health challenges through theatre.4. Helped bridge the gap between theater and community engagement, using art as a medium for social change.
